entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
